game.name: Ellie Vaccines Injection
game.description:
Vaccination on time helps people to overcome their several diseases and feel better during their bad health. It is important to get them done periodically to avoid many severe health dangers. Today is the time for Ellie to get her routine vaccine. But she is very scared and does not want to go to the hospital. Would you like to help her the necessary injections in this brand new girls game? Join Ellie Vaccines Injection and be prepared to play the role of her doctor!
Before giving her the vaccine, make sure that Ellie is feeling nice health wise. Check her heart rate first, and then try to make her feel relaxed by giving her a needful pill with a glass of water. Your next job in this HTML5 doctor game is to use a thermometer to check if her body temperature is ok. Now the time comes when you give her the vaccine. Start the procedure with disinfecting the area first. Once it is done, grab your vaccine and complete your task. 
Use the cotton ball then to wipe out the blood and do not forget to use a bandage on the top! Get ready to give your lady the second vaccine by repeating all the steps in this cool game for girls! We are hopeful that you give her annual vaccines properly to keep her away from being infected with a flu this season. Apply all the medical tools that you see in the doctor office to achieve your goal! Good luck to polish your amazing doctor skills once again!
